short_desc: Comprehensive primary health care, especially screening and family planning
description: One of three free standing ambulatory care clinics and part of Alameda Health System offering primary care for adults and children, immunizations, TB testing, obstetric/gynecological care, prenatal and postnatal care, chest clinic, family planning, sexually transmitted disease treatment, pregnancy testing and education and podiatry. Services by appointment only. Call 510-266-1700 to verify hours and schedule appointments. Offers free or low cost pregnancy testing.
